title: Senior Frontend Developer (React & Next.js)
description: We are seeking an experienced Senior Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in React, Next.js, and modern JavaScript practices. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining user-facing features, ensuring high performance and responsiveness. Experience with TypeScript and state management libraries (like Redux or Zustand) is a plus. This is a remote position with flexible hours.

title: Content Writer for Sustainable Living Blog
description: GreenLeaf Organics is looking for a talented content writer to create engaging and informative blog posts focused on sustainable living, organic gardening, and eco-friendly products. The ideal candidate should have excellent research and writing skills, a passion for sustainability, and experience with SEO best practices. Please provide 2-3 writing samples with your application.

title: Part-Time Virtual Assistant for Admin Tasks
description: We need a reliable and organized Virtual Assistant to help with various administrative tasks, including email management, scheduling appointments, data entry, and customer support follow-ups. Proficiency in Google Workspace or Microsoft Office Suite is required. Expected commitment is 10-15 hours per week.

title: UI/UX Designer for Mobile App Redesign
description: PixelPerfect Designs is looking for a creative UI/UX designer to lead the redesign of our flagship mobile application. You will be responsible for user research, wireframing, prototyping, and creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. A strong portfolio showcasing mobile app design work is essential. Experience with Figma or Adobe XD is required.

title: Python Developer for Data Scraping Project
description: We require a Python developer proficient in web scraping libraries (e.g., BeautifulSoup, Scrapy) to collect data from various online sources. The project involves setting up scrapers, handling data cleaning, and storing the data in a structured format (e.g., CSV, JSON). Previous experience with similar projects is highly desirable.
